Performance and functionality preserved. Ready for Task 1.2.

completion_criteria: All languages supported (en, es, fr, zh)
Watson fallback system operational during transition

2A.1.name: Mistral STT Integration
2A.1.description: Implement Mistral Voxtral API for speech-to-text processing
validation_steps: Test STT accuracy across all supported languages
Verify cost reduction achieved ($0.001/min vs Watson)
2A.1.notes: COMPLETED 2025-09-20. Successfully implemented Mistral Voxtral STT with voxtral-mini-latest model. All acceptance criteria met: API client working, multi-language support (12 languages), provider selection logic implemented, cost tracking integrated ($0.001/min - 98% cost reduction vs Watson), comprehensive testing validated. Ready for Task 2A.2.

2A.2.name: Local TTS Implementation
2A.2.description: Implement Piper TTS for local speech synthesis
acceptance_criteria: Piper TTS engine installed and configured
Local processing with zero cloud costs
2A.2.notes: COMPLETED 2025-09-21. Successfully implemented Piper TTS local engine with full integration. All acceptance criteria met: Piper TTS 1.3.0 installed and configured, en_US-lessac-medium voice model working, high-quality 22.05kHz audio synthesis, zero ongoing costs (local processing), complete speech processor integration with provider selection logic, comprehensive testing passed (3/3 test suites). Achieves zero cost TTS synthesis with 150KB+ audio files. Ready for Task 2A.3.
